data.text: @WasOnceLoved Hadn't thought of that. Probably motivated reasoning on my part but I'm v happy to believe that!
@robinwalterwolf @WasOnceLoved heading to Mars, I hope. Bon voyage!
@WasOnceLoved He'll be in his doomsday plane. Along with his friends and family.
@WasOnceLoved Suppose he thinks, 'I must protect myself at all costs so I can destroy my enemies in a nuclear inferno'? It's part of his pathology.
@WasOnceLoved Tangential point, but he uses the mile long table with most, but then sits within 3 feet of Bolsonaro & Lukashenko, the 2 biggest morons he mixes with.
@WasOnceLoved Good point, but We really don’t know what’s going through his head.!

@WasOnceLoved He will dig the army in deeper and let the conflict rage. Maybe he just wants other countries to get involved so he can prove a point. The nukes thing is dull and you can't see your handiwork on the news in real-time and absorb the contempt.
@fascinatorfun @WasOnceLoved I read that, and that they have married. You'd think, if that were true, he would be interested in them and not potentially starting WW3 and bankrupting Russia!

@WasOnceLoved @JonathanBuckn20 @hqbinders This is an interesting line of thought.

Do you have any references to corroborate that view?
